title: The credit card market of China under the financial crisis
abstract: In the current financial crisis sweeping the world, each country's financial market has been got a huge impact, which also includes the credit card market. However, relatively independent Chinese credit card market has experienced a good development. Credit card, as a global common modern form of currency in China is ushering in a new era. But the card is a high-risk, high-yield industry. China's credit card market has just begun, which has broad prospects for development and profitability of space, but also tremendous risks. In this paper, we elaborate that China's commercial banks should not only develop credit card business, but also pay much attentions to the credit card risk management according to the causes of credit risk, classification and analysis of the credit card market of the United States and China.
